member.name: F:Engine.PhysicsSystem.ContactGroup.CastAll
member.summary: For ray casts: Checks collisions with all groups.

member.summary: Static collision group.

member.summary: Physical models for MapObject based objects have this group.

member.name: F:Engine.PhysicsSystem.ContactGroup.NoContact
member.summary: There are no contacts.

member.name: F:Engine.PhysicsSystem.ContactGroup.CastOnlyCollision
member.summary: For ray casts: Checks only with Collision group.

member.name: F:Engine.PhysicsSystem.ContactGroup.CastOnlyDynamic
member.summary: For ray casts: Checks only with Dynamic group.

member.name: F:Engine.PhysicsSystem.ContactGroup.CastOnlyContact
member.summary: For ray casts: Checks only with Collision and Dynamic groups.

member.name: F:Engine.PhysicsSystem.ForceType.Local
member.summary: Apply a force in a direction relative to the Body's local coordinate system.

member.name: F:Engine.PhysicsSystem.ForceType.Global
member.summary: Apply a force in a direction relative to the global coordinate system.

member.name: F:Engine.PhysicsSystem.ForceType.LocalTorque
member.summary: Apply a torque with the axis specified relative to the Body's local coordinate system.

member.name: F:Engine.PhysicsSystem.ForceType.GlobalTorque
member.summary: Apply a torque with the axis specified relative to global coordinate system.

member.name: F:Engine.PhysicsSystem.ForceType.LocalAtLocalPos
member.summary: Apply a force at a position relative to the Body's local coordinate system in a direction relative to the Body's local coordinate system.

member.name: F:Engine.PhysicsSystem.ForceType.LocalAtGlobalPos
member.summary: Apply a force at a position relative to the global coordinate system in a direction relative to the Body's local coordinate system.

member.name: F:Engine.PhysicsSystem.ForceType.GlobalAtLocalPos
member.summary: Apply a force at a position relative to the Body's local coordinate system in a direction relative to the global coordinate system.

member.name: F:Engine.PhysicsSystem.ForceType.GlobalAtGlobalPos
member.summary: Apply a force at a position relative to the global coordinate system in a direction relative to the global coordinate system.
